extendedInfo.description: Here is a wallpaper collection of bridges in the various big cities around the world, they are amazing work of art and transportation. We made these wallpaper into a  3D Live Wallpaper within a cube and added special lighting effects to shine at the cubes. Features Include:Options for transparent box2 different light sourceOption to move lightOption to change viewing angle and change background color.Option for Auto rotation with speed control, or manual control with finger swipe.

reviews.comment: there are only two live wallpapers and nothing more
reviews.author: A Google User
